entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
